column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We started off with delicious bread and butter
column2: then made our way to a duck terrine appetizer (more bread). My wife had lamb (delicious) and I had the 22 oz. bone-in rib eye steak. Expensive? At 60 bucks
column3: yes. Worth it? Absolutely. We shared the fantastic elote corn (with cheese)
column4: and the pommes frites. We both had two glasses of wine
column6: both of which were smooth as silk. Oh
column7: and I also had mushrooms and garlic on top of the steak. I am here to tell you that the steak was buttery and delicious. I've never quite had it made that way
